game.name: Leisure Suit Larry - Wet Dreams Dry Twice
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: No obstacle will keep me away from my beloved, my Faith, not even the wild and untamed islands of Kalau’a. Those lovely island ladies can only distract me for so long as my heart’s compass only points in one direction - Faith!
game.shortDescriptionEn: No obstacle will keep me away from my beloved, my Faith, not even the wild and untamed islands of Kalau’a. Those lovely island ladies can only distract me for so long as my heart’s compass only points in one direction - Faith!

reviewHighlights.text: A much upgrade game of the first game. I recommend to just buy this game and skip the first game. You are not missing much in gameplay or story.
I dig the game. It is a hoot. Laughing quite a bit through playing this game.
